title: Solve
text: The first step is to rewrite one of the equations in terms of one of the variables.

title: Solve
text: Rewrite the first equation in terms of x. What is the equation?

title: Substitute
text: Next, substitute the first equation into the second. Use the y-value you found in the previous hint, and simplify until you find the value of x.

title: Solve
text: Solve for x with the new substituted equation. What is the value of x?

title: Substitute
text: Next, substitute the numeric value of x that you now know into either or the original equations. Solve for y to find the numeric solution the system of equations.

title: Solve
text: What does y equal when the x value is substituted into either of the original equations?

title: Interpret
text: Knowing that $$x=-3$$ and $$y=-1$$, we can finalize our answer to be (-3,1)
